  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura: el mar y la poesía</string>
            <string language="en">Literature: the sea and poetry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur: das Meer und die Poesie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature : la mer et la poésie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura: o mar e a poesia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura: il mare e poesia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία: η θάλασσα και η ποίηση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu que tracta el tema del mar i la poesia. Des del grec Homer, el mar ha estat font d'inspiració dels grans poetes en totes les llengües. Mètrica: versos lliures o sense rima. Lectures de poemes: Espronceda, Juan Ramón Jiménez i Rafael Alberti. Activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on the subject of the sea in poetry. From Homer onwards, the sea has been a source of inspiration to great poets in all languages. Metre: free or unrhymed verse. Fragments from poems by Espronceda, Juan Ramón Jiménez and Rafael Alberti. Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">autor</string>
            <string language="en">author</string>
            <string language="es">autor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel bezüglich des Meeres in 
der Poesie. Von Homer vorwärts, ist das Meer eine Quelle der 
Inspiration zu den großen Dichtern in allen Sprachen gewesen. 
Meßinstrument: geben Sie frei oder unrhymed 
Vers. Fragmente von den Gedichten durch Espronceda, 
Juan Ramón Jiménez und Rafael Alberti. Selbstbewertung 
Aktivitäten sind auch für Praxis eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive au sujet de la mer dans la 
poésie. De Homer en avant, la mer a été une source 
d'inspiration à de grands poèts dans tous les langages. Mètre
: libérez ou unrhymed le vers. Fragments des poésies par
Espronceda, Juan Ramón Jiménez et Rafaël Alberti. Des 
activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses pour la 
pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo no assunto do mar na poesia. 
De Homer avante, o mar foi uma fonte da inspiração aos poetas 
grandes em todas as línguas. Medidor: livre ou unrhymed o
verso. Fragmentos dos poemas por Espronceda, por Juan Ramón 
Jiménez e por Rafael Alberti. As atividades do self-assessment 
são incluídas também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva a proposito del mare nella 
poesia. Da Homer in avanti, il mare è stato una sorgente di 
ispirazione ai poets grandi in tutti i linguaggi. Tester: 
liberi o unrhymed il verse. Frammenti dai poems da 
Espronceda, da Juan Ramón Jiménez e da Rafael Alberti. Le 
attività di valutazione di se stesso egualmente sono incluse per 
pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς σχετικά με το θέμα 
της θάλασσας στην ποίηση. Από Όμηρο και μετά, η θάλασσα 
είναι μια πηγή έμπνευσης στους μεγάλους ποιητές σε όλες τις 
γλώσσες. Μέτρο: ελεύθερος ή ο στίχος. Τεμάχια 
από τα ποιήματα από espronceda, Juan Ramσn Jimιnez 
και rafael Alberti. Οι δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης για την πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Autor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">auteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">genre littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">autor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genre literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">autore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">genere letterario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia letteraria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συντάκτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνικό ύφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνική ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
